website_summaries.verdict: The ultrapricey Note 9 is one of the year's best phones, but wait until Samsung announces its Galaxy Note 10 successor to make a decision.
pros: The Samsung Galaxy Note 9 is a big, beautiful phone with top-tier specs including a massive battery and internal storage that starts at 128GB
The new S Pen doubles as a wireless remote for taking long-distance selfies
cons: It's expensive and offers few real innovations over last year's Note 8
The fingerprint reader is uncomfortably close to the camera

customer_reviews.title: Got a DOA and a silver generic pen!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if Samsung is supposed to shrink wrap new phones. Mine did not come shrink wrapped like iPhones. Also, upon receiving the package, I noticed the sticker was not "temper proof". It was half peeled off. Then when I went to charge the phone, it would not turn on or charge. It was a DOA. Also, note the weird foam ring on the power button. This does not seem right. More alarming is this was sold by AMAZON.COM instead of a 3rd party seller. Called tech support, and was offered a replacement, but now the replacement would not arrive until January 2, 2019!!!
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Verify your carrier will activate!!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot activate phone with Sprint. Phone boots up in Spanish. Tried for 3 days to get it activated but it was a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Not new. Total hack.
customer_reviews.text: This is an att phone. Who knows what security has been hacked. I would like a new phone as advertised. I'm pretty pissed as now I have to goto my cell provider and get a new SIM $20, because who knows who will be able to retrieve my 2 step verification.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - Fake/Dud Phone was Received
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung Galaxy Note 9 cell phone I received was not a real phone. First, the package did not contain any accessories, not even a charging cable. Second, after I went out and purchased 2 different types of chargers (a USB-C cable and a wireless charger), the phone would not charge. Third, I could not remove the S-pen or the Sim card tray. Fourth, the buttons also could not be pushed in. Fifth, the phone's back cover only had the Samsung logo, not the model of the phone or the MEID. The phone reminded me of the sample phones that are sometimes on display at a store. It was a fake phone.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: The only phone that's worth $1000
customer_reviews.text: I also have the iPhone Xs Max and I have to say that phone does not use the big screen AT ALL. No picture-in-picture, no dual screens. Heck, you can't even do full screen video unlike the Note 9. The Note 9 does it all and with a pen. If I had to rely on only one phone for the next few years, I would choose the Note 9.
customer_reviews.author: Smith Adam

customer_reviews.title: Highly highly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The phone box did not have a seal....the phone face and back was filled with fingerprint smudges as if someone was using it.....there was no manual in the box one of the USB connectors was missing
customer_reviews.author: Denese Fearon

customer_reviews.title: Better off with a pixel 2 xl
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone to replace my pixel 2 xl. Camera on the note 9 is trash when compared to the pixel. Battery life is trash. Phone performance is not impressive either, considering it has a newer CPU and 2 extra gb of ram. My pixel was faster. This phone is very underwhelming, and not worth the price at $1k. I only like the headphone jack, screen, and build quality. Otherwise, spend your money elsewhere because this phone just isn't a winner.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Defective right out of the box and AMAZON will not assist with the return
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone as Deal of the Day. I had to get a SIM card and was traveling for work so I did not have time to go to the store and get a SIM for a few weeks. The phone has NO in call volume right out of the box. I was told by the store it was defective. I spoke to AMAZON and it was zero help. Told me to contact Samsung. DO NOT ever buy something this expensive on AMAZON. You will receive no assistance with the exception of Not my problem, contact Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Love it!!!

customer_reviews.title: Brakes and scratches easy.
customer_reviews.text: Worst phone I ever had. Finally got use to it 4 months later drops from waist high and dosent function now. Absolutely first time last time. Because of the crack it lost 90% of its value costs $350 to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review for company The Whiz Cells
customer_reviews.text: This review is only for THE WHIZ CELLS not amazon. Got my phone and tried to activate nothing happened so I went to the website where the phone is from and guess what pops up phone is stole/lost. I decided to call at&t to make sure and I get told on the phone that phone is reported stolen. This is such a shame since I was excited to activate the phone. I suggest to everyone not to buy anything from THE WHIZ CELLS.
customer_reviews.author: Ismael

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: This phone is an upgrade from my almost 6 year old note 3...........WOW! What an upgrade! If it holds up as long as my note 3 then this will be a testament to samsung. The only con is that I cant replace the battery easily is needed.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Fruad!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Says it's new. Came with no charger or other equipment. Upon further review we opened the phone to find nothing but a metal bar acting as a weight. Deep fruad going on here!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Luken

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, Curved display seems more pain than its worth.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great phone over all and it works exactly as it should. Unlocking the phone via facial scan and GPay work great. The curved display seems completely unnecessary, however, causing many problems for no benefit. It just makes it really hard to get a screen protecter to fit the phone. Phone cases have to avoid covering the curved edge which leaves this area relatively unprotected should it fall on something edge wise.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't say its a waste of your $ but in my case it is. Beware and be careful
customer_reviews.text: The rear camera has previously been tampered with and the thin metal cover is bent and scratched and so is the lens. And the front screen has a deep chip missing out of it which weakens the whole screen overall. Spending over $350 on a phone is a lot of $ for me and I had hoped for better quality. I purchased this phone to to capture memories of my 2 babies and the camera and video recorder is just awful. Very dissatisfied, disappointed and bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Devan Culbertson

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up getting this instead of the OnePlus 6T and am pleased with that decision. I love it. I've always been a fan of using a stylus on my device and the built-in s pen with its features is really my favorite thing. The phone seamlessly connects with my Windows PC via WiFi and I can fully view and control it on my PC monitor. I only wish the battery lasted a little bit longer and for more durable charger box and cable included with device.
customer_reviews.author: Deacon Barfield

customer_reviews.title: Fake phone in the box. 3D printed
customer_reviews.text: Update Even Amazon gets scammed by some people. But they made it right by sending another phone out that was real. Took another week to get but the service was good so I added three more stars to the review. Happy wife happy life!! The samsung box was in cellophane and looked goto go. After opening it I noticed there was no charger and after picking up the phone it was a printed 3D version made out of plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: It has a headphone jack!
customer_reviews.text: I heard the note 10 was removing the headphone jack, so, I looked for an alternative with an s-pen. During Amazon prime day, I was happy to see the unlocked note 9 on sale and purchased it. I am very happy with its operation. The rear fingerprint sensor works quickly and my finger seems to rest where it is located. Therefore, I don't have any problems using it. I also use the iris and face detection feature. Sometimes it is fast and other times I revert to the rear fingerprint sensor. It isn't talked about much, but you can use earbuds with this phone. I have them also. Therefore, it seems like the best of both worlds.
customer_reviews.author: ytad

customer_reviews.title: buggy, buggy and buggy Apps constantly destabalize
customer_reviews.text: I contacted Samsung and Amazon regarding my problems and got nowhere. I was treated like I had never used a smart phone before and was not believed when I tried to explain the problems. The phone is a $600 paper weight! My sister used the same model phone and loved it! Mine was buggy buggy buggy! Especially poor game performance and Apps. Also JW Library app constantly destabilizes and I have to remove and reinstall over and over. What a pain!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's as good as I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this phone. I didn't know what to expect with all the negative feedback I read. I can say that my phone is an USA phone unlocked no scratches or scuff marks...not a display phone or a gutted phone!! When I called Carrier I had no issues getting my sim card registered...so far it has been great. My only down side is the battery life isn't what all the rave is about...lasting for 2 to 3 days...i ha e to charge it everyday....besides that the phone is awesome. I'm glad I went out on a limb and purchased my note 9!!!! ( p.s. the stylus is the original Samsung stylus!!!)
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this phone as I've been an apple user my whole life but I am a bit sad as I just purchased this phone 2 days ago and now see it 20 % off bummer I could of went with the midnight black and 512 GB and paid the price I paid for 2 days ago. Sucks but shout out to Amazon for the fast shipment would be great if you price match me and give me the difference
customer_reviews.author: eddie Martinez

customer_reviews.title: No samsung support
customer_reviews.text: Samsung keeps pushing an update that the phone is not taking. The notice says if problem persists, contact customer service. But they provide NO contact info for something they have access to or control over. The update retries hourly, draining the battery. I also suspect the problem is requiring the phone to be restarted two and three times a day, because I lose internet and phone service. I have used the community board on Samsung's site. Many others are having same problem; recommended remedies do not work. The phone is a POS and the customer service is even worse. They just do not care.
customer_reviews.author: Frank H.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Note 9
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Samsung Galaxy Note 9. My last phone was a Note 5, and I love the expanded memory. My phone was unlocked by Samsung and was very easy to connect to Verizon service. I called in and used their customer service. I especially love the ability to mute the phone for a time period, so no calls during my meetings and no forgetting to turn the sound back on. Great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Got my note 9 yesterday, (htown). Item was even better than expected! Was able to delete most att bloatware and what I couldn't delete, I disabled. No nicks, scratches, dings, like new. I can't even tell someone used it before I got it. Nice phone. Still learning all the new features of note 9. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is big. Otherwise I love it. No issues setting it up with Verizon. It came with two small scratches, which was to be expected buying a used phone. The s-pen was stuck. But I Google how to get it out and it works fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Sisk Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: My fantastic Note 9
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. I couldn't believe that I could transfer EVERYTHING from my old phone at home. Not only contacts but pictures and email as well as text.....love..... Love... love it !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Note 9 is the best
customer_reviews.text: Phone is great,wish it could have come with a handbook,would help me explore all the features i haven't gone into. As far as phone goes, it's super and glad i got it. My note 3 was great but it started to mess up too much and battery life was short, too many problems and got tired of phone messing up on me. Now i'm happy with my note 9 and i need to learn what i can do with it. thank you Amazon, you have great service.
customer_reviews.author: Juan J Chagoya jr

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two and love them! My wife and I love them and this is our 3rd Note. We had 1, 4 and now 9. Only complaint is they were made in 2 different countries though they were ordered together and arrived in same delivery. So the programing differs occasionally which a bit of a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Stella & Darleen

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: My family and friends insist on texting; with my Samsung Edge 7, the screen was too small (or my fingers too big!). This has a stylus and the screen is bigger, so so far I definitely like it. Got my Supcase to protect it, and I am in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: K. D. Webber

customer_reviews.title: Discounted phone with lots of issues
customer_reviews.text: It was used. Hanging problem. Phone updates the software but again it trips are the same software again and again. Discounted phone but lots of issues
customer_reviews.author: Prateek

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic device!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Coming off a much older J7 I have to say the price of entry was worth it! So fast it's crazy. 128 GB is so big I can load all my apps with no issue. Best unlocked phone I can get for the money. Fully recommend with no reservations!
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased from third party dealer which I never do at all. It said prime so I went for it. This is the 3rd phone from this dealer. It came in good condition , a few nicks and small scratches at top but nothing a case didn’t cover. Great phone for a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Spicychic

customer_reviews.title: Dont trust this seller
customer_reviews.text: Dont trust this seller they say factory unlocked phone but is not true. That is from carries unlocked I send my phone to samsung for warranty i sent unlocked and samsung send me a lock phone cuz the imei info was a locked phone so they say in the page factory unloked but that is not true i still having problen to unlocked the new phone
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and elegant design.
customer_reviews.text: I love the phone so far. Have had it for a couple of weeks now and it's working very well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: The note 9 uses a diffrent cable then the s7 or before
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! I upgraded from the s7 to this and im very happy with it, the phone screen is very big and has a great display the battery will last around 3/4 of the day depending on usage and it charges fast. All apps run smooth and fast, no crashs. The price is steep but for value i say its worth it for the features. The pen is great for notes and is good for point and choose games.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Sheets

customer_reviews.title: I'm gonna return this
customer_reviews.text: The screen is has way too many mark's on it and the speakers don't work right
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: A larger battery is a must.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has longer lasting battery unlike my prior phone. Fingerprint scanner is perfect when driving, and when others are looking over your shoulder. I also like the option to use the headphone jack, expandable storage and the vivid photos. Dex is a plus. Of course the upgraded s pen is a plus. The only negative is the price of flagship phones. I was patient to watch the price drop.
customer_reviews.author: vett

customer_reviews.title: Samsung is the Best
customer_reviews.text: At first i thought it was way to big, but after using it for awhile i start liking the size.... Finger Print scanner is good, takes time to get used too... Best Samsung Phone i have so far....
customer_reviews.author: Jre

customer_reviews.title: Not original charger and really bad quality
customer_reviews.text: It was good but the charger wasn’t the original and the is really bad ! I tried to contact the seller 4 times with no replay from their end . The battery went bad because of the charger .
customer_reviews.author: Sara Els

customer_reviews.title: Great product I love it
customer_reviews.text: I received my phone (Galaxy Note 9) in almost a week. It looks good I wouldn't be able to tell it was used if there was a booklet in it. I'm happy with the product so far, I have no complaints. I haven't used the fingerprint lock yes so I can't rate it. Overall great product, and speedy delivery. I am extremely satisfied..
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Carter

customer_reviews.title: Unlocked for any carrier
customer_reviews.text: Phone was in brand new condition. Just phone and stylus, no charger or any other accessories. Was very good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy Note? More like Galaxy Diggy Dope!
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone, it does what it needs to do it's my mobile work system. From reviewing docs to editing promo videos ,its that jamm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Above and beyond
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Everyday use. Been one year now and no issues whatsoever in performance
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS NOT A US WARRANTY
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone as a part of Prime Day 2018 (less than a year ago). When I tried to register it with Samsung for my warranty, Samsung informed me that the warranty for this phone is not a US warranty. For such an expensive purpose, I'm absolutely peeved that I was scammed by Amazon. Now, my phone has screen burn-in and there is nothing I can do about it.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Best phone for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This phone is truly amazing it works how I expected it to work the Spen is flawless the camera is great the software is great as well great phone overall the only thing I'm not too crazy about is my back housing it's all scratched up but I'm good
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Item was as expected
customer_reviews.text: This phone is exactly as promised.ni did not know what unlocked meant, had to take it to a Sprint store for some kind of chip but after that it was smooth sailing.
customer_reviews.author: joy A sundstrom

customer_reviews.title: The phone is a beast
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a bang for your buck this is it. It is a monster. 6.4 in 6 gb ram and bluetooth 5.0. That's just a couple features. The phone was best of 2018 and that is still clearly evident. I love the phone and I've had no issues with it I will always recommend samsung products and especially the note products because they are just that good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Microphone issue
customer_reviews.text: Microphone don’t work and every time I have to restart the phone. I got late for four hours to replace the phone
customer_reviews.author: Arlene H

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great. Cheaper than could purchase with my phone carrier. Good value. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DavidT

customer_reviews.title: I got a FAKE PHONE.
customer_reviews.text: I was all excited for my new phone, so I opened it up and found this. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Not a "Used, Very Good" Phone
customer_reviews.text: I just received my phone, and it has noticeable scratches covering roughly 40% the screen. I would have expected that from a "used acceptable", not a "used very good"
customer_reviews.author: Alex Moldovan

customer_reviews.title: Do ya research on your end before u buy
customer_reviews.text: The phone is great I reached out to the seller did my research before I bought phone everything checked out everything is ok they know there stuff if something wrong contact them they will get u square great company thank u I will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Victor C.

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: This is my daily driver. Using it for 5 months now. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Sal

customer_reviews.title: Buyer be ware
customer_reviews.text: Keeps saying profile update error. I've done factory reset several times and still get same message after trying to update.
customer_reviews.author: Heriberto Lausell

customer_reviews.title: YHE BEST PHONE EVER
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS WUITHOUT A DOUBT THE BEST PHONE I EVER HAD , EXCELENT EVERYTHING, DISPLAY, SOUND, VIDEO AND PICTURES ARE ALL A1 PREMIUM GRADE
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great choice to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very high speed phone, amazing features, great for professional or personal lifestyle without having to worry about a charge on your phone
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Kaye McWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Phone is in perfect condition and works great. Just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: big beautiful display
customer_reviews.text: This is my,1st ever review but I has to write.I have been doubtful for months now but finally decided to purchase, the phone was brand new and unlocked I couldn't be more happier everything was perfect..still getting use to its big beautiful screen its all I expected and more. Thank you WWB LLC
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: If battery and memory are what you need, this is it!
customer_reviews.text: I have had the note for about 3 months now. Great battery life, enormous amount of memory. Phone is great, hope to keep for 3 years or more.
customer_reviews.author: Talyr

customer_reviews.title: not bad...for an android.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his phone and I'm happy that he does.
customer_reviews.author: will edwards

customer_reviews.title: Powerhouse of a Phone!
customer_reviews.text: Fast, smooth, and with 6/8 GB of RAM and 128/512 GB of storage with microSD card slot for extra storage up to 1 TB, this is one hell of a phone. For about $700-$750, this cellphone will provide the biggest bang for your buck. Easily 5 stars for the Samsung Note9.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Pang

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this phone.
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from the 6 edge and I just love this phone. The camera works very well, I use the pen all the time, and it holds a long battery. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eckland Music

customer_reviews.title: Phone will not charge after 1 year. Huh
customer_reviews.text: My phone just stopped charging. It won't turn on at all. It is only one year and I feel like I don't have to buy a new phone every year. This is a lot of money to throw away like that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Extremely fast with brilliant screen colors, it's just great, if you can afford it, you won't regret it
customer_reviews.author: Remon

customer_reviews.title: Darn good phone, darn good deal.
customer_reviews.text: The specs speak for themselves. I dug the pre- order deal. More than $500.00 retail worth of extra goodies was nice. Thanks Samsung! This was my 2nd Samsung since the Note 2... from way back. Upgraded from the LG V10, which I had for a few years. If you upgrade once every few years like I do.... might as well get a good one. And few, if any, are better than the Note 9 IMO. Oh yeah... I love being carrier agnostic. Factory unlocked rocks! Peace and love.
customer_reviews.author: Jamal

customer_reviews.title: The last good phone
customer_reviews.text: The best phone ever, like thanks giving with all the trimmings note 9
customer_reviews.author: One got

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: May have just got a bad one out of the bunch
customer_reviews.author: Oceanlvr

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Note 9 because the first one was advertised as unlocked but it was still an AT&T product and I couldn't use all of my Verizon apps. I've had a Note 4 every since they first hit the market and loved it. I like my 9 better especially with my new screen protector on it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Scott

customer_reviews.title: Weak Pen Material
customer_reviews.text: 4 days since I bought this for my wife as her birthday gift. Bought the best UAG cover for it. My wife just dropped the phone by accident today. She was just standing in the kitchen and the phone slipped off her hand...and the S pen broke in 3 parts :(
customer_reviews.author: Aki

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Phone!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend the seller I have had this phone for over 2 years and I'm still using it still works great I've never had any issues with it
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Not for Verizon
customer_reviews.text: Verizon refused to activate this model of phone, despite repeated attempts with multiple reps and supervisors. Will not work with Verizon
customer_reviews.author: Micaiah white

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Love the new Galaxy Note 9. Perfect size. Just a little bigger than the Galaxy s8+
customer_reviews.author: alan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: My product came in better condition than i thought it'd come in.
customer_reviews.author: krillin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: A great device that truly is years ahead of its time.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Masters Jr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone but check with the seller to make sure you get one that works with your carrier
customer_reviews.text: The phone is great and mine came in perfect condition. I would recommend that you verify what model of phone you are getting as well as if it is compatible with your carrier right after purchasing. It will save you a lot of time.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I'm not providing a review of the phone itself, however beware: the posting indicates very specifically that there is a SIM included in the box, but there most definitely is not. Here's hoping I don't have to pay too much more at my carrier to get one.
customer_reviews.author: Purchased

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. It is fast, and has a great battery. I have had iPhones for years, this is my first android, I won't go back.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Barron

customer_reviews.title: Everything I hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: Product was practically new. Everything works as expected. Well satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone love it. Very fast and great camera quality.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Great phone purchase and experience
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! I thought I had purchased a Note 9, but I'm very happy with the phone! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Danielle S Brice

customer_reviews.title: Music and Video Apps randomly paused every 5/10 mins for $1000 Phone
customer_reviews.text: Tried many things, disable power save function, disable wifi, disable data, disable bluetooth, disable app notification, still no luck. Considering returning the phone. Other than that, the phone is awesome, other than the fast charge is not that fast
customer_reviews.author: Guoku

customer_reviews.title: Great price combo
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a xmas gift. The stores weren't offering any deals off this phone. I received the phone and echo show 2nd generation. Happy with both!
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Searle

customer_reviews.title: Camear
customer_reviews.text: I love the ability too write notes, the remote camera click on the pen I haven't used ALL the features yet but I like what I've used. I especially like the price I paid on 'Prime days'
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Crable

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Reasonable pricing!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The seller was honest in their post . There was no signs of wear on the phone. It is unlocked as stated.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Unusable phone in the US
customer_reviews.text: This phone was built for the Arab Emerates and I was unable to use it in the US
customer_reviews.author: Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Superb value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife as a Christmas gift and she LOVES this phone! Folks at Verizon helped get the old one switched over and it was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Joe H.

customer_reviews.title: Too many features
customer_reviews.text: Too many to have explored them enough to know how good it is... mind blowing!
customer_reviews.author: Mateo Gabacho

customer_reviews.title: WiFi calling with T-Mobile
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, it didn't have T-Mobile features such as WiFi calling. However, once the sim card was installed, it automatically updated to get everything specific to T-Mobile.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: 128gb version

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional phone
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to make a comment on the recent reviewer's statement about how the S Pen's ink is yellow and doesn't contrast well with a white screen background. I'm gradually becoming familiar with my Note 9 and i found out that if you invert/select "negative color" in the settings menu, the yellow ink will contrast with a black background on the screen very nicely. All you have to do is go under accessibility in your settings, then to vision, and finally to the negative color option. It takes a few extra steps but the difference is very noticeable. By the way, this phone is phenomenal!
customer_reviews.author: TBO

customer_reviews.title: Samsung has locked out the "wi-fi calling" option on these phones
customer_reviews.text: Samsung has locked/eliminated the "wi-fi calling" feature on these phones. I spoke with Samsung who told me that they do this in an effort to force buyers to purchase the phone from a carrier like AT&T. I asked if AT&T could add this feature to my phone and they said no. I have been a long time Samsung customer but this will be my last one!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth G.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung does not honor the upgrade offer: Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am incredibly frustrated as I bought this phone due to the upgrade offer advertised on the banner. Despite meeting all the requirements per Samsung and Amazon, the Samsung promotions team would not accept the Amazon invoice as proof of purchase when trying to register it. After 4 phone calls to Samsung and 3 chats and a phone call to Amazon, each telling me that they did not know why it was not working and telling me to call the other company I have finally had it. It is false advertising to list the product with a promotion that the promotion team is not accepting.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin T. Yang

customer_reviews.title: Wow wow wow its incredible
customer_reviews.text: I have a Huawei mate 10 pro Xiaomi mi mix 2 and an essential ph1. The first two I retain are excellent phones, but this note 9 is something from another planet. The screen is incredible, and despite the size is easily held in the hand and I am small hands, the phone is very reactive and has a very good signal reception, almost the same as the Mate 10 and much higher than the Xiaomi. But what really makes it unique is the s-pen. It is difficult to describe what you can do in words you have to prove it. You assure them that they will not regret if they buy it
customer_reviews.author: Francesco L

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Note 9 Factory Unlocked Phone with 6.4" Screen and 128GB (U.S. Warranty), Ocean Blue
product_meta.description: Size:128 GB| Style:Phone Only| Color:Ocean BlueThe new super powerful Note. The largest battery in a Note, ever. When you have a long lasting battery, you really can go all day and all night. This model is not compatible with 5G. Comes with Single Nano SIM Port.
feature_bullets: The largest battery in a note, ever When you have a long lasting battery, you really can go all day and all night
The Note9 has twice as much storage as the Note8, which means more music, more videos, more pictures, and less worry when it comes to space on your phone
The Note9 gives you a quick network connection for incredibly fast streaming and downloading, so you can do more, uninterrupted. One Nano SIM and one MicroSD slot (up to 512GB)
Still amazing on screen, but now the S pen has more power off Screen Remotely control different applications and use the S pen to capture shots from far away, scroll, and play music
At 64 Inches, the Note9 has the largest screen of any Galaxy phone Perfect for gaming and streaming, our super AMOLED display is bigger than ever before
